x86x64::XmmRegÂ¶

struct asmjit::x86x64::XmmReg
#include <x86defs.h>

X86/X64 128-bit Xmm register.

Public Functions

XmmReg()

Create a dummy Xmm register.

XmmReg(const XmmReg & other)

Create a reference to other Xmm register.

XmmReg(uint32_t type, uint32_t index, uint32_t size)

Create a custom Xmm register.

XmmReg(const _NoInit &)

Create non-initialized Xmm register.

XmmReg clone()

Clone BaseReg operand.

XmmReg & setSize(uint32_t size)

Set register size.

XmmReg & setCode(uint32_t code)

Set register code.

XmmReg & setCode(uint32_t type, uint32_t index)

Set register type and index.

XmmReg & setType(uint32_t type)

Set register type.

XmmReg & setIndex(uint32_t index)

Set register index.

XmmReg & operator=(const XmmReg & other)

bool operator==(const XmmReg & other)

bool operator!=(const XmmReg & other)
